comments.author: Arnold Schilham, UMCU
comments.creator: generate_config_json.py version 20180912
usage: "OCR_xxx": "xywh": "10;30;50;25" # x;y;width;height of bounding box of OCR_xxx
"OCR_xxx": "prefix": "TI" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx starts with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx": "suffix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx ends with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx": "type": "float" # after stripping prefix and suffix, text should be converted to this data type
If "OCR_probeID" is specified, OCR will be used to find an identifier for values, info from the dicom headers is used

params.auto_suffix: add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
add a probename as suffix to all results (True)
params.circle_fitfrac: use only this central fraction for circle fitting
params.cluster_mode: mode of connected components analysis; either all_middle (def) or largest_only
params.f_dead: below this fraction of avg signal, the element is considered dead (.5)
params.f_weak: below this fraction of avg signal, the element is considered weak (.5)
params.hcor_px: default lines to exclude from left and right when making profiles (10)
params.init_pt_x0y0x1y1: restrict initial search of reverb pattern in px
params.signal_thresh: threshold on pixelvalues for reverberation patterns; use>0 for noisy data (0)
params.vcor_px: default lines to exclude from top and bottom when making profiles (10)
